I have joggers from H&M that have held up for a almost a decade in far better condition than these reached in under one year.

The fit leaves a lot to be desired. I’m 5’6 172lbs, I normally wear a men’s small shirt, and medium for shorts/ briefs/ joggers (30x30 pant) but these are just cut weird. Every time I bend down or sit, they slip below my uh, crevasse. I hate that feeling. And if you try to hike them, then you’re going up the crevasse and between the berries. I can sinch the drawstring tight and tie it, but that unfortunately does nothing. And to think, Amazon’s suggested size was small! Glad I went medium, probably could have done large though since they are just cut weird I can’t imagine that would have helped much, same problems just baggier in the legs. They’re good for the price as a camp/ around the house sweat, but be sure to go a size up from normal.

评论概述: Truly the hidden gem of sweatpants
评论详情: While my search for the perfect pair of sweatpants (joggers to be more specific) might never come to an end, these sit on top of the list for contenders. No matter what fancy, overpriced, hand-stiched, preshrunk, fully formed pants I've bought (and I've tried a bunch of them), none can compete with the fit and build of these. They just fit. They're comfortable, are well constructed, and last. And on top of all of that, the price is just a cherry on top. I'd gladly pay more for these.

I was skeptical about buying these because it’s an Amazon brand and they were going to be cheaply made but thought I would take the risk. I was happily surprised. They are really soft and really breathable. Draw string is on the inside, pockets are a good size too. They are more baggy towards the top and then taper tight to my ankle at the cuff. I am 5’11” 220 lbs and the size large is slightly loose at the waist, and slightly long in leg length. I’m sure they will shrink into my size when I dry them. Definite props to Amazon for making them slightly bigger knowing the material will shrink. I would buy them again.
